product_name: Bronze Plaque - Dark Brown - Lugs with Studs
ml_tags: MACRO ALGAE BIO REACTOR (LIQUID TREE) CO2 emissions are on rise due to rampant Depletion of Trees, especially in Urban Areas. Belgrade (Serbia) has intro an alternative to counter CO2 issues in Urban areas, , called “Artificial Liquid Trees”. These Bio-Reactors consists of eerie green fluid (Algae) in a transparent tank, lit from inside & freshened, using Solar Plates. In such Photo-Bioreactors, Macroalgae is grown in 600 liters of water. Binding CO2 from the atmosphere, it produces O2 and Biomass, through Photosynthesis. One Bioreactor is capable of replacing one 10-year-old adult tree, or a full 200 m2 of lawn. PLANTED ON 20 DEC 2023
